channel.title: Crash during load
channel.description: After the part where you launch the rocket, and you go to that freight train, the game crashed during the loading screen. ( Right before the load kicked in, i was accelerating the train) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T10_23_52C0.mdmp (77.6 KB)
